title: Guy's help me out here with this plzz
content:
I'm decent in calculus and Little average in algebra.... I'm going through kcet.

[View Poll](https://www.reddit.com/poll/15lcukw)

comments.body: I'm getting through kcet too. What's ur rank bro ?
Mine is 4965..and yours?
Nice. Mine is 2029. Btw according to last year's cutoff, u can easily get into pes ec campus cse. It's good. Not as great as rr campus. Idk about jss.
Alright man...which college have you decided to get into??
PES RR or BMS
There's no difference between the campuses
I donno. From what I've heard PESU EC 's faculty isn't that great.
actually there are differences. i have heard there are better placements from rr campus and all the toppers chose rr campus during counselling
Placements are common for both campuses, they do not check which campus you studied in.
Which campus has better professor's??
you wont get AIML at RR with that bro
I have 2Ag(I don't feel proud to say this ngl)
It honestly depends. EC campus teachers can be quite strict, but they all teach from the same set of slides. I'd advise you to pick the campus that's closer to you.
nothing to feel bad about. If you're given something, it would be stupid not to use it lmfao
Please dont share half baked knowledge. Both campuses are the same - you can check the pinned FAQ post for more info. Recruiters don't even know which campus you are from.
The faculty at both campuses are mediocre tbh. There is no discriminator.
Exactly
asli account se aao chancellor
You can view my post/comment history to know that I'm a graduate :)
All that help just to hear this lmao
You are doing a great a lot of us appreciate you.
U may not get cse at jss(acc to ur rank)... But there is a little possibility of getting AIML in pes rr
What is the cutoff for cse at rr campus?
ðŸ˜‚
No idea about that, u can check in kea website
ec campus and rr campus has same teaching same placement
